^1^ **JupyterHub** is a web-based platform that allows multiple users to access and interact with Jupyter Notebook instances on a shared server. It is commonly used as a collaborative and interactive computing environment for data analysis, scientific research, and programming.

^2^ **Google Colaboratory (Colab)** is a free Jupyter notebook environment that runs in the cloud. There, you can work with our Jupyter notebooks by saving your own copy, write and execute code, share your work to collaborate with others in real-time.
